div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimotercio die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said day Williame colp lauchfully callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer at the Instance of alexander prat as first day of proces' And
the bailyes chargit Williame scrimgeour Officiar to pas and tak ane
strace of the said Williame and lat it to borgh' gif it be askit and'
warne him to compeir one friday that nixt cummis to ansuer to
the said alexander as secund day of process' et cetera

The said day sere Johnne Ruthirfurd' knicht lauchfully callit and
nocht comperit to ansuer at the Instance of mastir Androw craufurd'
procuratour and factour to dene Robert caruour as first day
of process' and thareftir the bailyes chargit androw nachtj offi
ciar to pas' and tak ane strase' of the said knicht and lat it to
borgh' gif it be askit and' warne him to compeir one friday
that nixt cummys to ansuer to the said mastir Androw as secund day
of process'

The said day marioun' mathousoun' lauchfully warnit at hir
habitacioun callit and nocht comperit to ansuer at the Instance
of thomas chamer as first day of process' And' the balyes char
git Androw nauchtj officiar to pas and tak ane strace of the
said marioun' and lat it to borgh' gif it be askit and warne
hir to compeir one friday that next cummis to ansuer to
the said thomas as secund day of Proces'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die Junij
anno quo supra

The saide day Johne arthour' grantit him aving tile Androw Cullane
ane puncioun' of claret wyne quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of lawe

The said day Androw nachtj lauchfullie preuit that he warnit sere Johne Ruthir
furde personaly apprehendit to Comper this day befor the aldirman and balyeis
tile ansuer' to mastir Androw Crafurd' procurator to dene Robert Keruour'
for certane gudis of airschipe pertening to him be deces' of vmquhile sere
Androw gray quhilkis knicht thris' callit and nocht comperit

Curia balliuorum Burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die mensis Junij Anno quo supra et cetera

The saide day mastir Androu craufurd' allegit that the articule
proponit be ser Johnne Ruthirfurd' sayand that the bailyes has
maid legis and bandis agane the said sere Johnne quharfor thai ar
Suspec Jug to the said sere Johnne And the balyes aftir the p
the said articule was proponit thai denyit and maid faitht
that euire thai maid neuir bandis or legis agane the said ser Johnne

The said day the bailyes commaundit and chargit William scrim
geour Ormund lesly gilbert prestoun' and Androw nachtj to pas to sere
Johnne Ruthirfurd knicht and warne him to entir one friday
that nixt cummis withtin the tolbutht to ansuer at the Instance of
mastir Androw craufurd' for certane ayrschip pertenying to him
as procuratour and factour to dene Robert caruour'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vijo
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame blakhale of that Ilk grantit to pay to
Thome of towy Samekile as he awe to pay of resone

The saide day the ballieis ordanit and chargit Androw nachtj and gilbert
prestone seriandis to pay to Duncane Colisone or mak him be pait
of tene firlotis of malt merchande gude within xx dais hereftir
becaus' Androw nachtj grantit that ane landman' was attachit for the
said' malt and grantit to pay the samyn befor him and he tuk souerte
to the pament of the Samyn

head.add: Seriandis chargit to Inbring the Rest of the ald' taxt

div.p:
The saide day the ballieis ordanit and chargit Williame scrimgeor
ormond' leslie and Androw nachtj thre Officiaris to pas' punde compele
and distrenye ale personis aving the Rest of the alde taxt
being vnpait Sett in tyme of the passing tile our' Soueran
lordis mariage quhen' Alexander menyeis was aldirman and Inbringe
the Samyn to pay mastir Williame strachein xl s' aving to him
and the money aving to sere Johne blak

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne of
mar' fospekar' that Copin hill sale Cum one friday that nexte
Cumis befor the ballieis within the tolbutht and preiwe Sufficientlie
that Androw lowsone tuk his hous' quhilk he nowe Inhabitis
for this Instant yer' siclikuys as he hed' it this yer' bigane And'
falyeing tharof the saide Copin sale fynde Souerte to the said' Androw
to keipe him Skathtles and Relewe him of his maile that he pay
bot ane maile

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis ordanit Dauid Kintor tile entir Thomas Dunbrek
the xl day lauchfule next hereftir befor thame within this tolbutht or ellis
to pay to Williame Watsone the thingis contenit in the actis of the buk
optenit vpon' the saide thomas

The saide day gilbert menyeis humerlie complenyeit to the aldirman and ballieis
that Niniane blinsele hed' gretlie trubulit him besekande tham of Remede of Justice
according tharto quhilk Ninian being accusit be the ballieis and court denyit that euire
he hede spokin' ony iniurious' langage of him or his fadir and maide fatht the
gret bodely aithe cumand' betuix that the Rehers' maide and spokin Anent the defraudyng
of our Souerane lorde in his Customes of Abirdene throwe him and his fadir was vntrew
and of nayne effect nor availe Ande atour for the Offence and trubulance committit Agan
the said gilbert the saide Niniane be him and thomas leslie his forspekar Referrit him
tile vndirlie the ordinance and commavnde of the aldirman and Counsale quhilkis
Riplie avisit Inclusit within the Counsale hous' of the saide burghe the saide
matir being considirit and Clerlie vndirstandin the saide Ninian one that ane part
and gilbert one that vthir part was oblist and bundin be the fathtis of thar bodiis
thar handis vphaldin to the aldirman tile vndirlie fulfile abide and Remane
at thar decret ordinance and deliuerance quhilkis riplie avisit ordanit and
deliuerit that the saide Niniane for the offence done to the saide gilbert he sale
Sytt done one his kne and ask the saide gilbert forgiwnes and prey the aldirman
balyeis and counsale to make Instance to the saide gilbert to Remyt and forgif
the said' Ninian' quhilkis was done and frelie Remittit In presence of the
saide aldirman ballieis and counsale Ande atour thai ordanit and deliuerit
that gif euere the saide Niniane dravis ane knyf tile ony persone In tyme
to Cum and beys conuict tharof for strubulance in his defalt that he sale pay tene
pundis vsuale money of Scotlande to Sanct Nicholes werk vnforgevin
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day the Court wardit schew for lawe and It was gevin for dome
that Copin hile hede falyeit in his preiwe that was assignit him to prewe
that Androw lousone tuk his hous' quhilk he nowe Inhabitis siclikwis'
and price as he hed' it this yer' bigane et cetera Ande atour that he awe to Sett
Souerte to the saide Androw to keipe him skathtles for ane maile paying
eftir the tenor of the actis maid' tharapon' obefor

The said day the balyes ordanit Elizabetht setoun' to produce and'
schawe befor thame one monunday the xxj day of the monetht'
of Julij Instant the Richtis and Euidencis quhilkis schow has and
wile ws' anent hir coniunctfeftment of ane land clamyt be hir liand' in the
castelgait be deces' of vmquhile James leslie hir spous' certefeing
hir gif schow will dois nocht that thai wile Entir and' knaw Dauid
leslie to the said land' as Ayr' to his saide Williame fadir
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijto Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy Colp tutor tile Isabele buchan chargit and ordanit
William Rollande to decist and mak nay mair' Costis nor' expens' one
the hous' and tenment quhilkis he Inhabitis pertening to him and to writ and
mak his compt and he sulde allowe b him ale thingis that ar' to be allovyt
Spendit one the said' hous'

add.foreign: Waus sdminus skene et vxor sua

div.p:
The saide day the court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for dome
that the lard of Skene and his wif hede falyeit in thar prewe takin to
prewe Richerde Waus pait of tua s' Scottis Anent the Rest of ane caldron' pane
for the quhilkis thai war' in ane Amerciement of the Court and awe to pay the
saide ij s'

The saide day Williame Rollande oblist him be his hande vphaldin to stande
and abide at the ordinance of Johne leslie aldirman mastir Walter leslie parsone of
mennivir' Alexander menyes Dauy menyes Johne of mar' and patry leslie Anent the
money clamyt on' him be the saide aldirman the saide William being warnit
tharto aucht dais Obefor

The saide day Dauy talyour Come Souerte and dettour for the wif of Johne
Ramsay to pay to Williame Colpe ale thing that the cane preiwe sufficiently
aving to him be the saide Johne Ramsay et cetera

The saide day the actioun' debatabile betuix William Colp William Kintor and
Alexander Prat was continevit to friday that next cumis and the saide partiis oblist
thame to Comper the said' day for ministriacioun' of Justice

Eodem die Johannes meldrum conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Andree fyf prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio Willelmum Smytht Et Idem Willelmus conuictus fuit pro perturbio ipsius Johannes
et quilibet altere emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die matheus branche deuenit plegius legalis per manus et bona quod Willelmus smytht
erit Indempnis pro Johanne meldrum aliter quam per viam Juris Et Walterus Sa Allan
sone deuenit plegius quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro dicto Willelmo aliter quam per viam
Juris
Et vtraque pars obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi
fidiussione

The saide day the aldirman and counsale present for the tyme grantit ane burges
frelie to be maid' to Thomas leslie ane of the balyeis of this burghe
for his labouris and gret diligence done and to be done In the Inbringin
of the malys of this tone for this yer' for the quhilkis the saide thomas
oblist him to inbring gathir' and vptak ale the saide malys and pay ale
pensiounis and bring Sufficient acquitance and mak ane fre tovne for this
yer'

The saide day Androwe bavne tuk to preiwe that marioun' Walcar' was pait
of ale thingis that scho clamyt him of furthtwith Ande producit certane
witnes in the premiss' Ande thareftir with consent of thomas leslie forspekar to the
said' marioun' grantit and consent that the saide Androw sulde produce vthiris witnes
In the saide matir one Sanct James evin that next Cumis
